patthana24.11:1.1_0: Naappaccayaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:2.1_0: Naappaccayaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaccayo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:3.1_0: Nasanidassanaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassano hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:4.1_0: Nasanidassanaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sanidassano nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana24.11:5.1_0: Nasappaṭighaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca appaṭigho hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:6.1_0: Nasappaṭighaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca sappaṭigho nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana24.11:7.1_0: Narūpiṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca arūpī hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi,
patthana24.11:7.1_1: adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… purejāte āsevane ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.11:8.1_0: Narūpiṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca arūpī nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Gaṇitakena tīṇi. Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi,
patthana24.11:8.1_1: ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… aññamaññe tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana24.11:9.1_0: Nalokiyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokuttaro hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana24.11:10.1_0: Nalokuttaraṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana24.11:11.1_0: Nalokiyaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana24.11:12.1_0: Nalokuttaraṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca lokiyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana24.11:13.1_0: Nakenaci viññeyyaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci viññeyyo hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.11:14.1_0: Nakenaci naviññeyyaṁ nanahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca kenaci naviññeyyo nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
